title: The Echo Reset
outcome: Halden's programmed 'reset' triggers citywide erasure of BCI files, leaving only enigmatic Echo messages. The system vanishes; people become consumed by interpreting Halden's cryptic remarks. The city transitions to an era of myth-making, fierce debate, and grassroots assemblies, with the Council's authority crumbling as communal reflection and murals replace rankings.

events.description: A series of poetic, cryptic messages appears on every former BCI terminal, signed only with 'H.' Citizens flock to read and interpret them.
All remaining BCI data erases itself overnight, leaving only the Echoes. Daily life reshapes around improvised agreements, with residents refusing any return of centralized scoring.
Spontaneous public art, debates, songs, and murals flourish across the city, each themed around one central Echo: 'You are more than your score.'
With the Council powerless, civic assemblies and mutual aid groups form to direct services, resolve disputes, and plan society’s future, rejecting algorithms in favor of direct participation.
